Issued By : Agile NCR 2020 Program Committee
Organization : www.agilencr.org
Date of issue: 29 November 2020
Program : #AgileNCR2020 - AgileNCR 2020
This certificate is issued for participating in AgileNCR 2020 conference. AgileNCR is an annual Agile software development conference organized by Xebia and Agile enthusiasts of the NCR region.
